title: Looking for Duo (Silver+)
body:
Hey there,

My name is Baxter but I go by control on the internet. I am currently a Silver Jungle Main with a decent champion pool. I currently am the designer for Chiefs ESC (Number one OCE Team) and SIN gaming (Top 8 OCE Team). I've been playing LoL for a year now and aim to get to Master division next upcoming season. 
I play for at least 3 hours a day (Great waste of spare time haha) and play mainly at night. 
I'm just looking for a dedicated player who is looking to rise up through the divisions as well. 

My overall goal is to get to master and hopefully be in the OPL or even a sub for a team. I work hard for things I set my sights on and just need someone who is willing to do the same. 
{{champion:203}}

replies.body: i would the same but i dont think you will accept b3 trying to get out duo together and we shall work our way up
I would definitely be down for that, looking for the same thing.
I could duo queue with you, i am silver too, just reply back
